name: nativescript-google-maps-sdk
description: Google Maps SDK plugin for Nativescript

scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-google-maps-sdk && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo-vue.ios: npm i && npm run build && cd ../demo-vue && tns run ios --bundle --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo-vue.android: npm i && npm run build && cd ../demo-vue && tns run android --bundle --syncAllFiles
scripts.generate.typings.ios: cd ../demo && TNS_DEBUG_METADATA_PATH="$(pwd)/metadata" tns build ios && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH="$(pwd)/typings" tns build ios && echo 'Now look for your library typings in demo/typings!'

author: Dan Prietti <dprietti@gmail.com> (https://github.com/dapriett)
